page.title: 13MR. V. KNAPP OF OLDBURY
page.content: We interviewed Mr. V. Knapp of Oldbury who has lived in the village for 80 years. The Knapp family have lived in Oldbury for a very long time. Mr. Knapp went to Oldbury School. He said it was very strict and they often got the cane. They stayed off school to go hunting. They had 4 classes and stayed on until they were 14 though about 3 per year went to the Grammar School. There were 90-100 pupils and mainly did the 3R's. In the playground they played hockey with home made sticks and a golf ball, rounders and Jack upon the Mop Stick which only the boys played and was a kind of leap frog.
